title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 104.2 - Prohibitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 104.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations
(a) The
prohibitions of Part 51 of this Title apply to the area. (b) Except by prior written authorization by
the regional supervisor of natural resources, the following prohibitions also
apply: (1)
operating any motorized vehicle on
the area except on access roads and designated parking areas; (2)
parking beyond the limits of a posted
quota for vehicles or outside of a designated parking area; (3)
launching of vessels other than from
designated launch sites; (4)
open
fires; and
(5)
discharging firearms
except at wildlife which may legally be taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
104.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
